data.description: April Token is building REAP a mass consumer Celo-based dapp enabling users to earn crypto rewards by completing various tasks. These tasks include surveys, watching ads, playing games, shopping online, and other micro-actions, providing users with diverse earning opportunities.
data.title: April Token

data.description:
Project Title: April Zoe's GameFi Adventure - Fun and Fearless Onboarding to Web3 Gaming

Applicant Overview:
I’m April Zoe, a name inspired by two of my favorite gaming characters, embodying my love for gaming since the '90s. I’ve evolved alongside the gaming world and now explore the realms of Web3, NFTfi, GameFi, and the Metaverse. As a content creator, beta tester, investor, and active member of NFT communities like XBorg, Gam3s, and Ethlizards, I’m passionate about sharing the potential of Web3 gaming. Through my platforms on X, Discord, and Phaver, I strive to make Web3 gaming accessible and fun for all gamers, breaking down barriers with humor and ease. I'd especially like to empower and encourage women to join the space.

Project Overview:
April Zoe Presents: GameFi Goddess is a platform designed to introduce all gamers to the world of Web3 in a fun, approachable way. With a focus on using humor and simplifying blockchain concepts, the goal is to create a welcoming environment where gamers of all backgrounds can learn, explore, and thrive in the Sei Network’s gaming ecosystem.

Goals & Objectives:
Make Web3 Fun and Approachable: Use humor to break down the complexities of Web3 gaming, making it enjoyable and easy for all types of gamers.
Create Inclusive Content for All Gamers: Offer content that appeals to both experienced and new gamers, welcoming everyone into the Sei gaming community.
Build a Supportive Community: Foster a positive, inclusive environment where gamers can ask questions, join events, and feel empowered to explore Web3.

Focus Areas:
Content Series Development: Develop a series of short-form, humorous guides and videos to explain Web3 gaming concepts in a fun and relatable way.
Streaming and Live Content: Host interactive live streams and gaming events that provide both entertainment and education, creating a fun entry point for gamers into Web3.
Community Collaborations: Collaborate with a variety of gaming communities to introduce them to the Sei ecosystem, encouraging participation and growth.
Target Audience:
All gamers, regardless of experience with Web3, who are interested in exploring a new frontier in gaming. The aim is to make Sei’s ecosystem accessible and engaging for everyone, whether they’re new to blockchain or seasoned gamers looking to try something new.

Roadmap:


Phase 1: Content & Awareness (Months 1-2)
Launch a humorous and approachable content series introducing the basics of Web3 gaming on Sei. Create meme-based material to engage gamers in a fun and non-intimidating way.

Phase 2: Live Events & Community Engagement (Months 3-4)
Host live streams, gaming sessions, and Q&A events, encouraging gamers to try Sei games and become comfortable with Web3 concepts.

Phase 3: Growth & Partnerships (Months 5-6)
Partner with various gaming communities to grow the Sei ecosystem, bringing more gamers into Web3 through fun and engaging events and collaborations.

Milestones:

Launch first April Zoe Web3 gaming guide.
Host first live gaming event on Sei.
Onboard 100+ new gamers to the Sei Network.

Long-term Potential:
April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure will build an inclusive community that empowers gamers of all types to explore Web3 gaming. With approachable, fun content and ongoing events, the Sei Network will become a go-to platform for gamers wanting to engage in the future of decentralized gaming. The goal is to make the onboarding as easy and fun as possible.

Evaluation Criteria:
Content Engagement: Number of views, shares, and interactions across platforms.
Community Growth: Increase in the number of gamers joining Sei, reflecting a diverse and engaged player base.
User Onboarding: Track how many new users onboard to the Sei Network based on April Zoe content and events.
data.title: April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure

questions.query: Impact statement - what real world problem do you solve and how
questions.explanation:
Many users have idle time and seek to monetize it but lack accessible tools. They need low-barrier methods to earn money or rewards without requiring specialized skills or significant time investment. The prevalence of scams and unreliable payment methods further complicates their efforts.

REAP addresses these issues by providing a secure, blockchain-based dapp for users to earn from simple tasks. Users can earn crypto, easily convert it into stablecoins, and access secure, timely local cash-out options. Our solution promotes financial inclusion and aligns with Celo’s commitment to financial empowerment.

questions.query: Celo leverage - how does your project contributed to the Celo ecosystem?
questions.explanation:
April Token is using Celo as the core of REAP, since deployment to mainnet in March 2024, we have done over 1.1 million token reward transactions on Celo. 

Please see our Celoscan link:  https://celoscan.io/token/0x18719d2e1e57a1a64708e4550ff3def9d1074621

questions.query: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation: Each member of our swarm will have an OSS ecosystem address, be able to generate onchain and offchain actions linked to that account. This will involve not just payments but DAO operations and decentralized identity operations. We aim to expand the ecosystem by growing the Reap e-commerce swarm.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation: The Commerce Brain Grid is an AI-powered decentralized platform for e-commerce, smart home systems, and humanoid robotics. Its swarm intelligence aggregates real-time data from users, devices, and robots to deliver hyper-personalized deals, while its blockchain-backed architecture eliminates centralized control—unlike Amazon’s seller-centric model or Google’s isolated smart ecosystems.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
Reap’s Commerce Brain Grid is in the pre-launch phase, prioritizing the development and refinement of our decentralized, AI-powered deal discovery engine. We’re building the core architecture for our MVP, available at reap.deals, with active R&D focused on swarm intelligence algorithms for hyper-personalized recommendations and cross-platform integration across devices. Early trials include testing swarm logic with simulated smart home ecosystems, tracking algorithm accuracy and response times, and analyzing user interaction patterns. These efforts validate our tech’s potential to scale across e-commerce, smart homes, and future physical commerce applications.

Our go-to-market strategy unfolds in three phases. Phase 1 (2025) targets TikTok Shop, leveraging its global creator economy for initial user traction. We’re developing integrations and crafting marketing campaigns to onboard early adopters, gathering real-time data to refine our AI and user experience. Phase 2 (2026) extends into smart home systems, where we’re researching integration protocols with device ecosystems, aiming to embed deal discovery into daily environments—especially in high-growth markets like Beijing’s smart tech sector. Phase 3 (2027+) explores humanoid robot applications, with preliminary studies underway to bridge online and offline commerce and aiming to demonstrate Commerce Brain Grid’s adaptability to physical commerce interfaces as robotics adoption rises.

Currently pre-revenue, we’re channeling efforts into R&D and user acquisition groundwork. Initial customer acquisition efforts are focused on preparing for our Phase 1 TikTok Shop launch. We are growing our online presence via social media to generate buzz and build anticipation for the launch. Grant funding will be used to accelerate development, expand our team, and execute our TikTok Shop launch.

questions.query: How does your project create value for the Sei Web3 gaming ecosystem? Please provide specific examples.
questions.explanation:
April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure primarily drives value through creative and engaging content that educates and entertains. The project emphasizes fun, approachable content to onboard new users, foster engagement, and promote long-term growth in the Sei ecosystem.

Onboarding Through Content Creation: The project produces humorous tutorials, videos, and guides that break down Web3 concepts, making it easy for new gamers to enter the Sei ecosystem.

Example: A series of entertaining video guides walks gamers through wallet setup and blockchain gaming, ensuring noobs feel confident as they explore Sei.

Engaging Interactive Media: Live streams, Q&A sessions, and gaming events encourage real-time interaction with the Sei community, providing ongoing educational content and keeping users engaged.

Example: Streaming gameplay and hosting live tutorials where viewers can ask questions and learn about Sei games in an engaging, fun way.

Cross-Community Collaboration Through Content: Partnering with other gaming and NFT communities, the project creates joint events and co-branded content to introduce Sei to a broader audience.

Example: Collaborative content with XBorg and Gam3s helps onboard their communities into the Sei gaming ecosystem, expanding its reach.

Content-Driven Ecosystem Growth: By consistently delivering high-quality, noob-friendly content, April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure nurtures a loyal user base that grows with the ecosystem, creating long-term value.

Example: Ongoing content production keeps users engaged, while tutorials and guides encourage gamers to become active members of the Sei ecosystem.

questions.query: Describe your project's approach to community engagement and self-marketing within the Sei gaming ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure engages the Sei community through fun, interactive content and organic marketing.

Content as Engagement: Fun tutorials, live streams, and gaming challenges spark participation and build excitement for Sei games.

Example: April Zoe’s live streams and Q&A sessions allow gamers to ask questions and learn in a fun, interactive format.

Community Gaming Nights on Discord: Regular gaming nights bring the community together to play Sei-based games, fostering camaraderie and interaction.

Example: Weekly "GameFi Nights" on Discord allow players to connect, share tips, and experience Sei games.

Social Media & Platforms: Active on X, Discord, and Phaver, April Zoe shares highlights, game tips, and event recaps, creating buzz and drawing in new users.

Example: Sharing highlights from Discord gaming nights on social media boosts engagement and attracts more players.

Collaborative Growth: Partnering with NFT communities like XBorg and Gam3s creates joint events that expand the audience and bring new users to Sei.

Example: Hosting collaborative gaming nights with NFT communities helps introduce new players to the Sei ecosystem.

questions.query: Provide details on your team's expertise and history.
questions.explanation:
April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure is led by April Zoe, a passionate gamer with deep roots in the gaming world since the '90s, now fully immersed in Web3, NFTfi, GameFi, and the Metaverse. With decades of gaming experience and a strong presence in the Web3 space, April Zoe is not only a content creator but also an active participant in leading NFT communities such as XBorg, Gam3s, and Ethlizards.

As a beta tester, investor, sentinel, and university faction leader of Galactica Net, April Zoe has a proven track record of involvement in crypto projects. Her expertise in bridging traditional gaming and Web3, along with her strategic knowledge of NFT ecosystems, positions her to create content that simplifies and demystifies blockchain gaming for all players.

April Zoe is also highly active on platforms like X, Discord, and Phaver, where she consistently engages with the gaming and NFT communities, sharing insights, tips, and experiences. Her content creation skills and community-building expertise are central to her ability to grow and engage the Sei Web3 gaming ecosystem, making her the ideal leader for this project.

questions.query: How does your project demonstrate the potential to grow the gaming ecosystem on Sei?
questions.explanation: April Zoe’s GameFi Adventure demonstrates strong potential to grow the Sei gaming ecosystem by focusing on inclusive, engaging, and approachable content that attracts a wide range of gamers. By simplifying complex Web3 concepts through humor and interactive media, the project makes it easier for traditional gamers, noobs, and NFT enthusiasts to join the Sei ecosystem. I’d especially like to invite more women into gaming, creating a welcoming and empowering environment where they can feel confident exploring the Web3 space.
